title: Dell security advisory (AV25-538)
description: Between August 18 and 24, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Dell RecoverPoint for Virtual Machines (Debian)  versions prior to 6.0.SP3
Dell RecoverPoint for Virtual Machines (Linux)  versions prior to 6.0.SP3
Dell iDRAC Service Module  versions prior to 6.0.3.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
